Bug_report.TITLE: On Android, it is not possible to accept a Push notification when logging in using the Google icon
Bug_report.Precondition: <1>Open Winamp on desktop --> Add profile --> click on Google icon</1> <2>The Android device screen is not locked</2>
Bug_report.Steps_to_reproduce: <1>Open Winamp on desktop --> Add profile --> click on Google icon</1> <2>Press Accept on the Android screen</2>
Bug_report.Actual_result: The user is not logged in. The push notification remains on the Android screen
